title: Swamp Thing
summaries: The Swamp Thing is a Hardmode enemy that spawns only during a Solar Eclipse, during which he is about as common as a Zombie. It moves very fast and occasionally stops in place, leaving it vulnerable to attacks. (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) Swamp Things can open doors.

On the <linked>[img:Old-gen console version]</linked><linked> Old-gen console version</linked> and <linked>Nintendo 3DS</linked><linked>[img:Nintendo 3DS version]</linked><linked> version</linked>, they can drop the <linked>Broken Hero Sword</linked>, an item needed to craft the <linked>Terra Blade</linked>.
